title: Factors influencing U.S. consumers ' foods and beverages purchases 2012 to 2016
summary: The given chart is of multi-line type with 5 lines namely Taste, Price, Healthfulness, Convenience, and Sustainability. The y axis represents Has a great impact and the x axis represents Year.
Overall Sustainability is gradually increasing, Taste, Price, Healthfulness, and Convenience are roughly constant,  throughout the Year
Throughout the period, Taste generally had the highest Has a great impact relative to others with an average of 86.6, and it reached its maximum at 2014 with a value of 90.0.
Followed by Price which ranks as the second topmpost line , with an average of 71.2 Has a great impact,reaching its highest point  at 2012 with a value of 73.0.
The botommost line, Sustainability,  has a mean of 37.0, and peaked at 2016.
